meanings.sent1: The public restroom was the skeeviest place I had ever seen.
meanings.sent2: The garbage can had the skeeviest smell imaginable.
meanings.sent3: The old cheese in the fridge was so skeeviest, it practically waved goodbye.
meanings.sent4: The abandoned house had a skeeviest aura that sent shivers down my spine.
meanings.sent5: The slimy, moldy sandwich was the skeeviest thing I had ever tasted.

meanings.sent1: The horror movie had the skeeviest scenes that made me cover my eyes.
meanings.sent2: The dark alley looked like the skeeviest place to walk through at night.
meanings.sent3: The spider crawling on my arm felt skeeviest, but I managed not to scream.
meanings.sent4: The abandoned doll in the attic had the skeeviest stare that seemed to follow me.
meanings.sent5: The eerie silence in the haunted house was the skeeviest thing I had ever experienced.
